attributes.action: Allow VC Ghurka Heroe Mr Tul Bahadur Pun Into the Country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tul Bahadur Pun, a VC winner from 1944 is Refused to Live in Britian due to having "No strong ties to GB" He fought for our country, Gained the highest honour from doing so, and that doesnt seem enough to let him live here. Disgracefull.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
